channel.title: monome
channel.description: sound machines for the exploration of time and space

item.title: monome
item.description: 05/12/23 - grids came together faster than expected. we'll have a small batch available next friday, may 19, at 1pm EST. crow is now scheduled for late june. we're expecting to also have a small batch of norns in mid june.

item.title: monome
item.description: 04/20/23 - more grids expected late may, crow early june

item.title: monome
item.description: 03/10/23 - norns and crow are sold out. we'll have new batches of crow and grids later this spring.

item.title: monome
item.description: 03/07/23 - crow returns this on friday 1pm EST. note that the price has increased due to modern times. we'll also have a small number of b-stock norns. shipping will begin next week.

item.title: monome
item.description: 02/10/23 - we'll have a small batch of grids available next week, on the 17th at 1pm EST. the following day we'll have discounted b-stock grids available. shipping will happen a week or so after.

item.title: monome
item.description: 02/01/23 - crow is returning. some of the long-time part shortages have eased and we've started receiving components. we're working on some software improvements in anticipation of shipping a new batch. dates will be announced soon.

item.title: monome
item.description: 01/01/23 - shipping updates now have a dedicated page.
